      • sMario

        public final Main sMario

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mario

        public Mario(Main sMario,
             java.lang.String[] SVGData_s,
             java.lang.String[] SVGData_b,
             float xPos,
             float yPos,
             float xVel,
             float yVel,
             javafx.scene.image.Image... sprites)
        Constructs a single Mario.
        Parameters:
        sMario - The instance of Main class from where SPrites data is taken.
        SVGData_s - Collision Data for small Mario.
        SVGData_b - Collision Data for Grown Mario.
        xPos - Starting x-Position of Mario.
        yPos - Starting y-Position of Mario.
        xVel - Starting x-Velocity of Mario.
        yVel - Starting y-Velocity of Mario.
        sprites - Sprites images for Mario.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Mario Logic. Run by GameLoop class.
        Specified by:
        update in class Sprite

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition()
        Updates position of Mario on stage. Needs to be called manually in Mario logic (the update method).
        Overrides:
        updatePosition in class Sprite

      • setMidGrowth

        public void setMidGrowth()
        Used when Mario consumes a powerup. This disabled Player being able to control Mario while Mario's state is changing due to powerup.

      • getMarioState

        public int getMarioState()
        Returns Mario's state as:
        State 0: Small Mario
        State 1: Big Mario
        State 2: Super Mario
        Returns:
        Mario's State.

      • setSetMarioState

        public void setSetMarioState(int state)
        Explicitely set Mario's state. Does not guarantee that Mario's state change animation will be played. Use carefully.
        Parameters:
        state - Mario's State.

      • switchStates

        public void switchStates()
        Used to switch to next Mario State when Mario consumes powerup.

      • setAura

        public void setAura()
        Sets Aura around Mario.

      • resetAura

        public void resetAura()
        To change White Aura to Golden Aura.

      • setDeathSeqRunning

        public void setDeathSeqRunning()
        Used to mark start of death sequence of Mario.

      • isBottomCollided

        public boolean isBottomCollided()
        Check if Mario is in air.
        Returns:
        False if Mario is in air; otherwise True.

      • removeAura

        public void removeAura()
        Used to remove Aura for Mario (Mario must have atleast second level powerup for this to take effect).
